entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as a character who has gone to see an applicant for the post of Divination teacher. He is described as having a certain inclination against allowing the subject of Divination to continue.

entities.name: hog's head inn
entities.description: The Hog's Head Inn is mentioned as the location where Dumbledore met the applicant for the post of Divination teacher. It is described as being above a bar.

entities.name: divination
entities.description: Divination is introduced as a subject that Dumbledore has an inclination against allowing to continue at Hogwarts.

entities.name: fawkes's perch
entities.description: Fawkes's perch is mentioned as the location where Dumbledore retrieved the Pensieve from a black cabinet.

entities.name: pensieve
entities.description: The Pensieve is introduced as an object that Dumbledore retrieves from a black cabinet. It is described as being used to store memories.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as the person who had been tormenting Harry's father with the Pensieve in the past.

relationships.description: Dumbledore visited the Hog's Head Inn to meet an applicant for the post of Divination teacher.
